{'en': 'hello', 'hi_en': 'Namaste'}
{'en': 'Hello', 'hi_en': 'Hello ji'}
{'en': 'The movie is John Wick. Have you seen it before?', 'hi_en': 'The movie is John Wick. Kya tunme isse pahle dekha hai>'}
{'en': 'I just watched it yesterday ', 'hi_en': 'Haan, Kal I just watched it.'}
{'en': 'Did you enjoy it?', 'hi_en': 'Kya tumne yeh enjoy kiya'}
{'en': 'yeah I thought it was awesome', 'hi_en': 'Yeah mujhe lagta hain it was awesome'}
{'en': 'I thought the same thing when I watched it. Keanu was amazing in it.', 'hi_en': 'Muje wohi lagta hain jab I watched it. Keanu was amazing in it.'}
{'en': 'I feel like they dont make movies like that anymore, like action movies', 'hi_en': 'Mujhe lagta hain woh ab iski tarah do not make movies anymore, like action movies.'}
{'en': "They really don't and they should start making this style.", 'hi_en': 'Bilkul nahin and ab woh start making this style'}
{'en': 'Yeah exactly ', 'hi_en': 'yes exactly'}
{'en': 'It was nice to see John Leguizamo make a little bit of a comeback.', 'hi_en': 'yah dekh ke achcha laga ki John Leguizamo ne ek chhota mota comeback kiya hai'}
{'en': 'I dont remember seeing him in the first one', 'hi_en': 'Mujhe yad nahi first one me use dekhne ka'}

{'en': 'I would have had the same reaction as Wick  to anyone who killed the puppy my dead wife gave to me.', 'hi_en': 'mera reaction bhi Wick ki tarah hi hota agar kisi ne mere us puppy ka mara hota jo ki mujhe meri dead wife ne diya tha'}
{'en': 'yeah your right I would have gone insane.', 'hi_en': 'yes aap right ho mai bhi insane ho jata'}

{'en': "It was interesting to see a part of the assassin world. John Wick's car was pretty beautiful until it got stolen.", 'hi_en': 'bahut interesting tha assassin ki duniya ke part ko dekhna. John Wick ki car bahut beautiful thi chori hone se pahle.'}
{'en': 'I was thinking the same thing yesterday his car is cool.', 'hi_en': 'mai bhi kal yahi soch raha tha ki uski car kitni cool hai.'}
{'en': 'Hey', 'hi_en': 'aho'}
{'en': 'Hi', 'hi_en': 'HELLO'}
{'en': 'How’s it going?', 'hi_en': 'KAISA CHAL RAHA HAI?'}
{'en': 'Pretty good. Are you a Marvel fan?', 'hi_en': 'ACHA. KYA AAP MARVEL KA FAN HO?'}
{'en': 'Good to hear. Sure, what about you?', 'hi_en': 'SUN KE ACHA LAGA. AAP KA BHAT KYA HAI?'}

{'en': 'Yes, I am a huge Marvel fan. One of my favorites is the Avengers. Mark Ruffalo is great as The Hulk. ', 'hi_en': 'HA MAIN BAHOOT BADA MARVEL FAN HUH . AVENGERS MERA FAVORITE AUR MARK RUFFALO BAHOOT BADIA THA HULK JAISAA.'}
{'en': 'Sure, I liked the Avengers a lot.', 'hi_en': 'TEEK HAI , MERE KHO BHI AVENGERS PASANDH HAI'}
{'en': 'I also think Ruffalo is a great Hulk.', 'hi_en': 'MAIN BHI YE SOCH RAHA KI MARK RUFFALO BADIA HAI HULK KE LIYA.'}
{'en': 'Is Avengers the movie we’re supposed to talk about?', 'hi_en': 'kya Avengers aesi Movie he ki hame iske bare me talk karna chahiye?'}
{'en': 'Rotten Tomatoes gave it a 92% rating and average of 8/10. Yes, I believe so. ', 'hi_en': 'Rottten Tomatoes ne ise 92% rating di he aur 8/10 ka average. ya , me aisa believe karta hu.'}

{'en': 'Okay then. Right, I’ve always experiened that IMDB gives movies a lower average rating than rotten tomatoes.', 'hi_en': 'tab oke he. Right, me hamesha experience kiya he ki Rotten Tomatoes ke comparison me  IMDB movies ko lower average rating deta he.'}
{'en': 'Tha', 'hi_en': 'not he it is tha'}
{'en': "That's true", 'hi_en': 'ye to sure he'}
{'en': 'But I guess 92 and 80 are a fair assesment.', 'hi_en': 'but mujhe lagta he ki 92 aur 80 to fair rating assessment he.'}

{'en': 'Yeah, I think Joss Whedon was a good choice for director also. His vision was really inline with the comics. ', 'hi_en': 'han, mujhe lagta he ki director ke liye bhi Joss Whedon good choice . uska vision comics ke sath vastav me inline tha.'}

{'en': 'Well, I can’t speak for the comics (haven’t read them), but this movie is a great mashup of all the heroes and their stories.', 'hi_en': 'well, me comics ke regarding to kah nahi sakta (me unhe read nahi kiya ke), but ye movies all heroes aur unki stories ka ek great mashup ke.'}
{'en': 'I guess it’s just a very good movie with an amazing plot.', 'hi_en': 'meraguess ye he ki ye ek very good movie he amazing plot ke sath'}
{'en': 'I agree. ', 'hi_en': 'me agree karta hu.'}

{'en': "Loki using Clint Barton to help him with the Tesseract was awesome too. I like him even though he's a bad guy", 'hi_en': 'Loki ka Clint Barton ko use karna  Tesseract ki liye help k liye bhi awesome tha. Mujhe wo pasand hai even though wo bad guy hai'}
{'en': 'Right, that was a great scene.', 'hi_en': 'Haan, badhiya scene tha.'}
{'en': 'Loki’s a likable villain I’d say.', 'hi_en': 'Main bolunga k Loki ek likable villain hai'}

{'en': 'It was interesting how it caused such a riff within The Avengers. Thor still felt like he had loyalty to him for a long time during the movie. ', 'hi_en': 'Avengers me uska kaha suni karwarna kaafi interesting tha. Thor ko movie k doran aise lag raha tha uske liye loyalty hai'}
{'en': 'You think?', 'hi_en': 'Tum ye sochte ho?'}
{'en': 'I thought he was pretty ruthless with him.', 'hi_en': 'Mujhe to laga wo uske saath kaafi ruthless tha'}
{'en': 'That’s just my opinion obviously.', 'hi_en': 'Wo bas mera opinion hai obviously.'}

{'en': 'I can see that somewhat but he could have done a lot more damage if he wanted to. ', 'hi_en': 'Main wo dekh sakta hu but mujhe lagta hai wo bahut jyada damagar kar sakta tha agar wo chahta wo'}
{'en': 'Do you have a specific example on mind?', 'hi_en': 'Tumhare mind me koi specific example hai?'}
{'en': 'The end fight scene definitely was. He could have killed him. ', 'hi_en': 'Wo end fight scene definitely. Wo use maar sakta tha.'}
{'en': 'Oh, the one where Hulk ends up hitting him?', 'hi_en': 'oh wha kha hai jise hulk maar rha hai?'}

{'en': 'Yeah, that was classic. One of the funniest moments of the movie. I also liked when Iron Man fell back through the wormhole. It had everyone on edge I think. ', 'hi_en': 'ha yeh classic tha film ke sabse majedar samay mai se ek muje bhi pasand aya maine wormhole ke madhyam se vapas gir gaya muje lgta hai ki yeh har kisi ke pass tha'}
{'en': 'Absolutely. Epic scenes.', 'hi_en': 'bilkul mahakavya ke scenes hai'}
{'en': 'Can we talk about other movies or just this one?', 'hi_en': 'kya hum isse movie ke bare mai charcha ker sakte hai?'}
{'en': 'You know, MCU', 'hi_en': 'kya tum MCU jante ho?'}
{'en': 'I also like the way Nick Fury stood his ground with the Council. Just this one. ', 'hi_en': 'muje bhi yeh pasand hai ki nick fury ne council ke sath apna ground bta diya sirk yeh ek'}
{'en': 'Understood.', 'hi_en': 'samaj gya'}
{'en': 'Yeah, Fury’s great too.', 'hi_en': 'ha fury bhi bhota bada hai'}
{'en': 'So, any final thoughts?', 'hi_en': 'to koi akhri sujhav?'}
{'en': "It's crazy that the Council wanted him to drop a nuclear missile into New York. ", 'hi_en': 'ye crazy baat hai ki council chahti hai ki nuclear missile new york par gire'}
{'en': 'Great examples, man.', 'hi_en': 'great udahran, man'}
{'en': 'It was great talking to another MCU fan.', 'hi_en': 'Another MCU fan se talk karna great tha'}
{'en': 'Take care now!', 'hi_en': 'now dhyan rakhna'}
{'en': 'Definitely! You too!', 'hi_en': 'Definitely! tum bhi!'}
{'en': 'Hello!', 'hi_en': 'Hello?'}
{'en': 'Hello so the movie we will be talking about is Batman V. Superman', 'hi_en': 'Hello to hum aaj jis movie k baare me baat karege wo hai Batman V Superman'}

{'en': "Great! I haven't actually seen that yet, but have been really wanting to. Which actors play Batman and Superman?", 'hi_en': 'Great, maine abhi tak wo dekhi nahi hai, but sahi me dekhna chahta hu. Batman aur Superman kaun actors bane hai?'}

{'en': 'The actors are really great and you probably know all of them. Ben Affleck , Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, and Jesse Eisenberg to name a few.', 'hi_en': 'Actor bohot aache hai, aur tum shaiyad sabko jante ho. Ben affleck, henry cavill, amy adams, aur jesse eisenberg kuch naam hai'}

{'en': 'Oh, that is a great cast? Henry Cavill played Superman in the latest Superman film right?', 'hi_en': 'Oh ye to bohot aachi cast hai? Henry cavill ne superman ka kirdaar nibhaya tha na latest superman film me?'}
{'en': 'Sorry, a great cast!', 'hi_en': 'Maaf karna, ek aachi cast!'}

{'en': 'I am not sure but the film is still a part of the DC extended universe. Also it will be featuring wonder woman.', 'hi_en': 'Mai nahi bol sakta lekin film ek part hai DC extended universe ka. Aur vo naya kirdar wonder women bhi dikhayenge'}

{'en': 'Ooh, that is excellent. I am looking forward to seeing Wonder Woman! Are Batman and Superman enemies at the start of the film?', 'hi_en': 'Ye to kaafi aacha hai. Mai wonder women ko deekhna chahunga! Kyaa batman aur superman dushman hai movie chalu hote samay'}

{'en': 'Well lex luthor manipulates batman into a battle with Superman because he is obssessed with cloning superman.', 'hi_en': 'Kyaa lex luthor uksayega batman ko ek ladai ke liye superman ke saath kyunki vo obssessed hai clone superman se'}
{'en': 'Oh! So Batman is supposed to bring Superman to Lex Luthor?', 'hi_en': 'Oh! batman superman ko lex luthor ke paas lekar jata hai'}

{'en': 'No that is not the case however he is manipulated into helping. By the way did I mention this is going to be the first time batman and superman are in a movie together?', 'hi_en': 'Nahi ye case nahi hai jabki vo uksata hai madat karne ko. Kyaa maine bataya ke ye pehli baar hai ke batman aur superman ek saath movie me hai?'}

{'en': 'Really? The first time? That seems pretty amazing knowing that the characters have been around for so long! Very cool. Is the story set in Metropolis or Gotham?', 'hi_en': 'Sahi me? Pehli baar? Ye kaafi aacha sunai deta hai ke kirdaar aas paas rahe hai itne samay se! Kaafi aacha. Ye story metropolis me hai ya gotham me?'}

{'en': 'The film appears to take place in both cities, and Batman comes to view Superman as a threat to humanity.', 'hi_en': 'Film dono jagah hoti hai, aur batman superman ko ek khatre ke tarah deekhta hai manavta ke liye'}

{'en': 'That is interesting, to have the film set in both cities. So Batman sees it as his duty somewhat to take Superman down?', 'hi_en': 'Yeh interesting hai, dono cities mein film set hona. to Batman ne Superman ko neecha le jana kuch hadd tak apni duty mani hai?'}

{'en': "Well the relationships of the characters are quite complex because Clark Kent A.K.A. Superman learns of Batman's justice methods and tries to expose him. All this happening while Lex luthor makes moves to get approval to obtain kryptonite from a senator.", 'hi_en': 'Khair characters ke relationships kafi complex hai kyunki  Clark Kent A.K.A. Superman Batman ke justice krne ke tarike sikh gya hai or use expose krne ki koshish krta hai. Ye sab tab hota hai jan Lex Luthor ek senator se kryptonite lene ka approval lene ke liye chaalein chalta hai.'}

{'en': 'Interesting. And so, I imagine Lois Lane is in this story? If so, does she serve a greater purpose? Does she know both superheroes?', 'hi_en': 'Dilachasp. Aur isliye, mujhe lagta hai ki kahani mein Lois Lane hai? Agar aisa hai to, kya wo koi bada purpose serve kr rahi hai? Kya use dono superheroes ke baare mein pta hai?'}
{'en': 'Maybe but I am not sure. By the way do you usually care about reviews?', 'hi_en': 'Shayad but main sure nhi huin. Vaise tum aamataur par reviews ki paravaah karte ho?'}

{'en': "I will often read reviews to see what people have to say, but I don't change my mind about wanting to see a movie based on reviews. I think that I can't really know unless I see for myself. Do you care about reviews?", 'hi_en': 'Main aksar reviews ko padhta hoon ki logon ka kya kahana hai, lekin main reviews ke aadhaar par movie dekhne ke baare mein apana mann nahin badalata huin. Mujhe lagata hai ki main vaastav mein tab tak nahin jaan sakta jab tak ki main kud se nahi dekhta. Kya tum reviews ki paravaah karte ho?'}

{'en': 'Not usually I like to be my own judge however if the reviews are overwhelmingly bad or good then it may influence whether or not I watch in theatres. I have to say for this movies though the reviews are quite mixed. ', 'hi_en': 'Aamataur par main apana khud ka judge banna pasand karta huin lekin agar reviews bahut bure ya achhe hai to yeh influence kar sakta hai ki main cinema main dekhta hoon ya nahin. Mujhe is movie ke lie kehna hoga, haalaanki reviews kaafi mixed hai.'}
{'en': 'Did you enjoy this film?', 'hi_en': 'Kya tumne ye film enjoy ki?'}

{'en': 'I did. I really liked seeing the scenes where batman manages to subdue the superman.', 'hi_en': 'Han. Mujhe vaastav mein un scenes ko dekhna pasand tha jahaan batman superman ko vash mein karne ke arrangements karta hai.'}

{'en': "Cool. I guess that's one of the ultimate questions, which one could beat out the other. Do they team up at all in the film ?", 'hi_en': 'Badiya. Mujhe lagata hai ki yeh param savaalon mein se ek hai, kaun dusre ko hara sakta hai. Kya ve film mein team up krte hai?'}
{'en': 'Yes in Batman chooses to save Supermans mother while Superman confonts Lex.', 'hi_en': 'Han Batman Superman ki maa ko bachaane ko chunta hai jabaki superman Lex ka saamana karta hai.'}

{'en': "Oh wow! The pairing of Batman and Superman's mom is a really cool part of the story, heartwarming.", 'hi_en': 'tho acha hein! yeh tho batman aur superman ka mummy ka pairing hein jo bahut cool hein aur heartwarming hein'}
{'en': 'I know but the film ends with sadly the death of Superman.', 'hi_en': 'muje patha tha lekin is film ka end tho superman ka mouth tho bada sad huva'}

{'en': 'Oh wow! I am surprised by that, I thought they would keep their story line going for another movie or two. ', 'hi_en': 'are vah! mein tho surprised huva, lekin mein soch raha hoon ki is story line tho dusra movie se likha gaya hein'}
{'en': 'Dont worry the dirt on top of the coffin vibrates a nice wink from the Director.', 'hi_en': 'coffin ka vibrates ke baare mein koi worry na kare. kyon ki is wink us director ka hein'}
{'en': "Haha! That's the closing shot?!", 'hi_en': 'ha ha.. yeh tho closing shot nikhla'}

{'en': 'Awesome! Take care.', 'hi_en': 'awesome yar.. dhyan rakhna'}

", 'hi_en': 'kya tum apne aap ko same scenario mein imagine kar sakte ho? Unme bahut jyada trust hona chahiye. Yadi kuch bhi wrong hota h to wo limlbe mein khatm ho sakta h'}

{'en': "I couldn't imagine it. Sounds very risky. Especially if the dreamer dies in the dream before the sedative wears off.", 'hi_en': 'mein imagine bhi nahi saktha. voh toh badi risky sound kartha. expecially voh dreamer apna dream mein hi mar jaatha uska sedative wear karne ke pehle hi'}

{'en': "If the dreamer died and you end up in 'limbo', where do you think that is?  All of the extractors are living within that consciousness, what would become of them?  (since if he dies, that consciousness will cease to exist.)", 'hi_en': 'agar dreamer mar gaya toh limbo mein end hotha. kaise aise kar sakthe? sabhi extractors issi consciousness mein hi jee rahe hein. kya yeb sab ban baayenge?'}

{'en': 'Good question, and very thought provoking. In the movie they just went into limbo but I suppose the subconscious dreams would have to adjust to fit the new scenario. It would be scary to have the possibility of forgetting that you are in a dream at all. Do you think it would be worth  the potential setback?', 'hi_en': 'ache question kaafi provoking thought hein. is movie mein voh limbo ke liye gaye hein kyon ki mein subconscious dream par is scenario ko nahi mil paatha. bahut scary dream hein. kya aap ko is potential setback ke baare mein kya haal chaal hein'}

{'en': "I think that possibility is much greater than a setback.  I took it to mean that all the extractors as well as the subject would be trapped forever.  In that way it seems much too risky.  The aim is to plant an idea in someones mind without their realizing it, almost like mind control.  I think it would me much easier, and less risky, to sit and negotiate with someone.  Although, that's not at all subversive.  ", 'hi_en': 'muje lagtha hein ki is setback thoda jyada hein. muje lagtha hein ki sabhi extractors ko is subject ko trapped kiye gaye hein. is tarah mein toh yeh jyada risky nazar aa raha hein. uska aim ka plant toh koi dusri ka idea hoga jo koi mind control kiya hein. mein soch raha hun ki voh jyada easier ho tha aur risky bhi kam hota aur negotiate bhi kar sakthe. magar sab koi subversive nahi hote'}
{'en': 'Good point. What did you think about what happened to Mal?', 'hi_en': 'ache point hein. toh aap us mal ko kya huva?'}

{'en': "Mal's conflict is pivotal to this film. Is the reality we began this film in reality at all?  What do you think?", 'hi_en': 'mal ka conflick is film mein pivotal hein. toh sabhi intrigue ko is dream ka target diving hota hein, Mals ka action plant ka idea toh badi layers hein.. reality mein toh is film thoda jyada hi reality ho gaya. kya aap kya sochte hein?'}

{'en': 'Reality as we know it can be hard. If there was an alternate reality available that was more enjoyable I could see where Mal would want to believe it was the "real" reality. {'en': "As a child, Bruce Wayne falls down into a dry well and is attacked by a swarm of bats, subsequently developing a phobia of the creatures. While watching an opera with his parents, Thomas and Martha, Bruce becomes frightened by performers masquerading as bats and asks to leave. Outside, mugger Joe Chill murders Bruce's parents in front of him. Orphaned, Bruce is raised by the family butler, Alfred Pennyworth.", 'hi_en': 'bruce wayne jo bacha tha aur dry well mein gir gaya aur usse swarm of bats ne attack kar deya, lekin phobia ka creatures kuch subsequently develop ho raha tha.. yeh sab opera aur uska parents dekh rahe they, bruce tho dar gaya us bats ka performance dekhkar, aur use vaha hi chod diya.. bahar, mugger joe chill ne bruce parents ko murder kiya.. bruce ab orphaned ho gaya'}

{'en': "Fourteen years later, Chill is freed in exchange for testifying against Gotham City mafia boss Carmine Falcone. Bruce intends to murder Chill, but one of Falcone's assassins does so first. Bruce's childhood friend, assistant district attorney Rachel Dawes, berates him for attempting to undermine the justice system, saying that his father would be ashamed. Bruce confronts Falcone, who tells him that real power comes from being feared. Bruce decides to travel the world and learn how to confront injustice. While serving a prison sentence for theft in Bhutan, he meets Henri Ducard, who trains him as a member of the League of Shadows, led by Ra's al Ghul. After completing his training and purging his fears, Bruce learns that the League intends to destroy Gotham, believing it to be corrupt, decadent, hypocritical and beyond saving. Bruce rejects the League's cause and burns down their temple during his escape. Ra's is killed by falling debris, while Bruce saves the unconscious", 'hi_en': "14 years ke pehele, chill ne exchange karne pe freed huva aur gotham city ke liye testifying kiya uska mafia boss carmine falcone ke saath.. bruce tho chill ko murder kiya aur uska falcone ka assassins ko pehle maara.. bruce ka childhood friend, assistant district attorney rachel dawes, ne usse berateskiya aur usse injustice de diya. aur unke father shame ho gaye.. bruce ne falcone ko confronts kiya aur unhone unka real powers ko faced kiya.. bruce ne world pura travel kiya aur kaafi sikh liya... lekinbhutan ko jab unhone prison gaye tho unhone henri ducard ko meet kiya aur unke paas member of league ka shadows ka train liya jo ra's al ghul ko led kar rahe they. training aur fear ko puging ko complete karne ke baath, bruce ne league ko sikh liya ki kaise gotham ko destroy kare.. ra's tho debris ko kill kiya, lekkin bruce ne usse unconsciously save kar diya"}

{'en': 'Batman intercepts a drug shipment, provides Rachel with evidence against Falcone, and enlists Sergeant James Gordon, one of the few honest cops left in Gotham, to arrest him. In prison, Falcone meets with Dr. Jonathan Crane, a corrupt psychiatrist whom he has helped smuggle drugs into Gotham, and threatens to reveal his complicity if he does not declare  him mentally unfit for trial. Crane puts on a scarecrow mask and sprays Falcone with a fear- inducing hallucinogen that drives him insane (which causes Falcone to constantly mouth the  word "Scarecrow"), and has him transferred to Arkham Asylum. While investigating "the Scarecrow", Batman is exposed to the hallucinogen and left incapacitated. He is saved by Alfred and given an antidote developed by Fox. When Rachel accuses Crane of corruption, Crane reveals that he has been pouring his fear-inducing drug into Gotham\'s water supply. He drugs Rachel with it, but Batman saves her and subdues Crane, who claims to work for Ra\'s al Ghul. Batman evades the police to get Rachel to safety, administers the antidote, and gives her a vial of it for Gordon and another for mass production. Ducard reappears at Bruce\'s birthday party and reveals himself to be the true Ra\'s al Ghul. Having stolen a powerful microwave emitter from Wayne Enterprises, he plans to vaporize Gotham\'s water supply, rendering Crane\'s drug airborne and causing mass hysteria that will destroy the city. He sets Wayne Manor aflame and leaves Bruce to die, but Alfred rescues him.', 'hi_en': 'Batman ne intercepts kiya us drug shipment ko, lekin rachel us evidence se falcone ko against kiya, aur sergeant james gordon ko enlists kiya, yek imandar cop tho us gowtham ko left kar de, arrest karne keliye. prison mein, falcone, Dr jonathan crane se mila, jo yek corrupt psychiatrist hein jo gotham ko drugs dene par help kiya aur use threatens bhi kiya us complicitiy ko reveal karne pe, agar voh mentally unfit hoga tho use declare nahi karega. crane ne tho us scarecrow mask pehena aur falcone ka dar ko sprays out kiya. voh hallucinogen tha kaafi insane huva fir us arkham asylum ko transferred bhi kiya.. jab scarecrow ko investigating kar rahe the, tab batman ne us hallucinogen ko exposed kiya aur incapacitated ko left kiya. voh alfred ko save kiya aur usse fox ka antidote developed de deya.. jab rachel ko crane ka correptionko accusses kiya gaya, tab crane ne reveal kiya ki usse drug se dar hein aur voh gowtham ka water supply tha.. voh rachel ko drugs addit kiya lekin batman ne usse save kara aur crane ko subdues kiya jo ra ke liye voh work kar raha tha. batmen ne police ko evades kiya aur rachel ko safety kara, Ducard ne fir us bruce ka birthday party par aaya aur voh raa ka ham se reveals kar de. voh yek powerful microwave chura liya us wayne enterprises ke saath. aur usne gotham ka water supply ko vaporize karne ka plan kara, aur city ko destroy karne par tula huva tha. lekin wayne manor ne aflame kiya aur bruce ko maar daala, lekin alfred ne recuses ki leiya'}

{'en': 'The Blind Side is a 2009 American biographical sports drama film written and directed by John Lee Hancock, based on the Book The Blind Side: Evolution of a Game by Michael Lewis. The storyline features Michael Oher, an offensive lineman who was drafted by the Baltimore Ravens of the NFL. The film follows Oher from his impoverished upbringing, through his years at Wingate Christian School, his adoption by Sean and Leigh Anne Tuohy, to his position as one of the most highly coveted prospects in college football, then finally becoming first-round pick of the Ravens. It stars Quinton Aaron as Big Mike, Sandra Bullock as Leigh Anne Tuohy, Tim Mcgraw as Sean Tuhoy.', 'hi_en': 'Blind Side is 2009 ki American Biographical sports drama film hai jise John Lee Hancock ne write aur direct kiya hai joki Michael Lewis ki Book The Blind Side: Evolution of a Game pe based hai. Story me Micheal Oher ek offensive lineman hai jo NFL me Baltimore Raven se draft ho jata hai. Film me Oher ki gareeb upbringing aur uske Wingate Christian School k saal, uska Sean aur Leigh Anne Tuohy se adoption se college football me sabse coveted prospect ki journey aur phir finally Raven ki first round pick banna hai. Usme Quinton Aaron as Big Mike,Sandra Bullock as Leigh Anne Tuohy, Tim Mcgraw as Sean Tuhoy hai.'}

{'en': "Noah writes to Allie every day for a year but Anne intercepts the letters and they never reach Allie. Noah enlists with Fin to fight in World War II, where Fin is killed in battle. Allie volunteers in a hospital for wounded soldiers, where she meets officer Lon Hammond Jr., a young lawyer who comes from old Southern money. The two become engaged, to the delight of Allie's parents. When Noah returns from the war, his father has sold their home so that Noah can buy the abandoned house. While visiting Charleston, Noah witnesses Allie and Lon kissing at a restaurant; he convinces himself that if he restores the house, Allie will come back to him. {'en': 'What is your opinion on the movie Jaws? ', 'hi_en': 'philm joz par aapakee kya raay hai?'}
{'en': 'To be honest, I find shark movies to be terrifying.', 'hi_en': 'sach kahoon, to mujhe shaark philmen bhayaanak lagatee hain.'}

{'en': "I can't say I blame you. The movie definitely makes that fear worse! ", 'hi_en': 'main yah nahin kah sakata ki main tumhen dosh deta hoon. philm nishchit roop se us dar ko badatar bana detee hai!'}
{'en': 'Did you know that this film was based on a book?', 'hi_en': 'Kya tumhe pata hai ki ye film ek book par based hai.'}
{'en': "No, I didn't. Not surprised though. Most movies tend to be. ", 'hi_en': 'Nahi , maine nahi. Lekin mein surprise nahi hun zyadatar movies mein aisa hi hota hai.'}
{'en': 'I do love the Jaws music though. ', 'hi_en': 'Lekin Jaws ka music mujhe pasand hai.'}

{'en': "Agreed, it heightens the tension and makes it scarier, but that's kind of the point.", 'hi_en': 'Agreed, ye tension ko badhata hai aur isko aur daravana banata hai, lekin shayad uska wahi point hai.'}

{'en': "Are you surprised at how high the rating is for the film's critic score? And if I heard the music while driving, I would think someone was coming to take me out. Haha", 'hi_en': 'Kya aap surprised hain ki is film ki critic score rating itni high hai ? Aur agar mein iska music driving karte samay sunoon to mujhe lagega ki koi mujhe maarne aa raha hai. Haha'}

{'en': '97% is incredibly high, I would have thought that there would be at least some people throwing low scores in there somewhere.', 'hi_en': '97% bahut zyada high hai , mujhe laga ki kam se kam kuch log to low scores denge.'}
{'en': 'Do you agree that it\'s a "cheerfully perverse" scare movie?', 'hi_en': 'Kya aap sehmat hai ki ye "cheerfully perverse" daravani movie hai ?'}

{'en': 'That\'s what I thought as well. Maybe it\'s because it was never done before in it\'s time and was so different when it came out? It might be easier to "give it a pass"   And I would say it could be "cheerfully perverse" depending on the kind of movies you enjoy. ', 'hi_en': 'Mujhe bhi aisa hi lagta hai. Shayad isliye kyunki us zamane mein aisa pehle nahi hua tha aur jo nikal ke aaya wo kafi alag tha ? Usko ""give it a pass" dena easier hoga aur mein kahunga ki ye "cheerfully perverse" depending on aap kaisi movies pasand karte hain.'}
{'en': 'Do you think that it "is too gruesome for children"? ', 'hi_en': 'Kya aapko lagta hai ki it "is too gruesome for children"?'}
{'en': 'For small children, yes. I could see them having nightmares.', 'hi_en': 'Chhote bacchon ke liye haan, unko nightmares aa sakte hain.'}

{'en': 'I definitely agree with that. I do find it odd that it is considered a "Thriller" film. ', 'hi_en': 'main definitely isase agree karta hoon. Mujhe yah ajeeb lagata hai ki ise ek "Thriller" film maana jaata hai.'}

{'en': "I think it's interesting that in the key scenes it describes the economic impact on a beach town of the shark attacks. Makes you wonder if they'd cover something like that up to make more money in real life.", 'hi_en': 'mujhe lagata hai ki yah interesting hai ki key scenes mein yah  shark attacks ke ek beach town pareconomic impact ka baare main batata hai. Aapako aashchary hota hai ki kya ve real life mein adhik paisa banaane ke lie aisa kuchh cover karenge.'}

{'en': 'In today\'s society, I think that would absolutely be the case. Even if there was a bounty hunter hired, they would probably go, "Nothing to see here, have fun!" ', 'hi_en': 'aaj ke society mein, mujhe lagata hai ki aisa hee hoga. yahaan tak \u200b\u200bki agar ek bounty hunter ko kaam par rakha gaya tha, to ve shaayad bolengain, "yahaan dekhane ke lie kuchh bhee nahin hai, maze karo!"'}

{'en': 'I find it interesting that they put it in a fictional "New England resort town". You would think they would\'ve picked somewhere in California since there\'s so many beaches and how huge it is. ', 'hi_en': 'mujhe yah interesting lagata hai ki unhonne ise fictional  "New England resort town" mein rakha tha. Aapako lagata hai ki ve Californiamein kaheen aur le gae hote kyonki vahaan bahut saare beaches hain aur yah kitana vishaal hai.'}

{'en': "Agreed, there typically aren't many shark attacks in New England, usually further south or on the west coast.", 'hi_en': 'Main ye maanta hoon ki , aamataur par  New England mein bahut saare shark attacks nahin hote hain, aamataur par south mein ya west coast par.'}

{'en': "I can't imagine I would keep going to the beach as a tourist if lots of people kept turning up dead.", 'hi_en': 'main imagine nahin kar sakata ki main ek tourist ke roop mein  beacht par jata rahoongan , agar bahut saare log marate hue paaye jate rahein.'}

{'en': 'I agree. The movie is kind of silly the more you think about it. Especially when people keep believing the town and beach team that everything is fine. Yet people keep dying? I guess they want you to suspend disbelief. Haha. ', 'hi_en': 'Main agree karta hoon. Movie ek tarah se silly hai , jitana bhi aap isake baare mein sochate hain. khaasakar jab log shahar aur beach team par vishvaas karate rahate ki sab kuchh theek hai.phir bhee log marate rahate hain? mujhe lagata hai ki ve chaahate hain ki aap disbelief ko suspend karen. hah।'}
{'en': 'Or you would think that tourists would join in on the bounty to make the money. ', 'hi_en': 'ya aapako lagata hai ki tourists paisa banaane ke lie bounty mein shaamil honge.'}
{'en': "I wasn't aware that there were so many different types of sharks so near to the shore. ", 'hi_en': 'mujhe pata nahin tha ki kinaare ke paas itane saare different type ke sharks the.'}
{'en': 'The key scens describes both a tiger shark and a great white.', 'hi_en': 'key scenes main tiger shark aur ek great white, donon ka varnan kiya gaya hai.'}

{'en': "I wonder if the mayor is paid off somewhere in the town or gets a cut of the beaches being open? He's far to adamant about keeping them open.   And I always thought Tiger Sharks were smaller. ", 'hi_en': 'Main soch raha tha ki mayor sheher mein kahin paise leta hai ya beach ke khulne pe? Woh beach kholne par bohot adamant tha. Aur mujhe humesha lagta tha ki Tiger Sharks chotti hoti hain.'}
{'en': 'I always think of Great White\'s as the huge "Jaws" sharks. ', 'hi_en': 'Maine Great Whites ko humesha unn badi "Jaws" sharks ki tarah socha hai.'}
{'en': "It seems odd that they don't ask a scientist or marine biologist at some point to intervene.", 'hi_en': 'Ajeeb hai ki woh kissi scientist ya marine biologist ko beech mein nahi laa rahe.'}
{'en': 'Even the last key scene describes a pretty limited plan to hook the shark or harpoon it.', 'hi_en': 'Last scene mein bhi bohot hi limited plan hai shark ko hook ya harpoon karne ka.'}

{'en': 'I agree. They have an "Oceanographer" to help determine a shark attack. But no scientists ever get brought in to help the situation. ', 'hi_en': 'Sahi, I agree. Unke paas shark attack determine karne ke liye ek "Oceanographer" hai. Par koi scientists nahi laaye help karne ke liye.'}
{'en': 'It seems like a pretty poor plan, and they end up having to make it up as they go along. ', 'hi_en': 'Kaafi bekar plan hai, aur aage jaate jaate woh plan banaate jaa rahe hain.'}
{'en': 'It seems crazy that a shark could take out a "Shark-proof" cage. ', 'hi_en': 'Kitna crazy hai ki shark ne "shark-proof" cage todd diya.'}
{'en': 'Plus, the reward of only $10,000 seems pretty low to risk lives.', 'hi_en': 'Aur, $10,000 ka reward bohot kam hai life risk karne ke liye.'}
{'en': 'Maybe it was worth a lot more in 1975?', 'hi_en': 'Shayad 1975 mein isse zyaada worth tha.'}

{'en': "I agree. Not worth it to me. I'll go on vacation in NYC instead and avoid the shark. Haha. ", 'hi_en': 'Haan. Mere liye toh worth nahi hai. Shark ko chhod ke, main NYC vacation par chala jaoonga. Haha.'}
{'en': "And it was definitely worth more in 1975. I just don't know how much. ", 'hi_en': 'Aur yeh 1975 Definitely adhik kimat ka hoga.me nahi janti how much.'}

{'en': 'I do very much agree with you! {'en': "As a child, Bruce Wayne falls down into a dry well and is attacked by a swarm of bats, subsequently developing a phobia of the creatures. While watching an opera with his parents, Thomas and Martha, Bruce becomes frightened by performers masquerading as bats and asks to leave. Outside, mugger Joe Chill murders Bruce's parents in front of him. Orphaned, Bruce is raised by the family butler, Alfred Pennyworth.", 'hi_en': 'bachpan me, Bruce Wayne ek dry well me gir jata hai bahut sare bats ke dwara attack kiya jata hai, subsequently usko ek phobia develop ho jata hai creatures se. Ek din apne parents Thomas aur Martha ke sath opera dekhte hue, Bruce bahut dar jata hai performers ko bat ke roop me dekhte hu aur outside jaane ke liye bolta hai. Outside me chor Joe Chill Bruce ke parents ko murder kar deta hai. Anath, Bruce unke family butler,  Alfred Pennyworth ke dwara pala jata hai.'}
{'en': 'Ah so they stick to the comic closely, thats a good thing.', 'hi_en': 'Oh to wo comics ke bahut close rahe, yah badi achchi baat hai.'}
{'en': "Michael Caine must be Alfred. I can't see him playing anyone else.", 'hi_en': 'Michael Caine jarur Alfred hoga. Mai use koi aur role play karte dekh hi nahi sakta.'}

{'en': "Yes, origin-wise, it's pretty close. Bruce's traveling around the world and training is a part of it. Which has never been shown on screen before.", 'hi_en': 'Yes, Origin-Wise, ye pretty close hai. Bruce around the world travel karta hai aur training iska part hai. Aisa kuc screen pahle kabhi nahi dikhaya gaya hai.'}
{'en': "Yes he's an amazing Alfred", 'hi_en': 'Yes, Wah amazing Alfred hai.'}

{'en': "Fourteen years later, Chill is freed in exchange for testifying against Gotham City mafia boss Carmine Falcone. Bruce intends to murder Chill, but one of Falcone's assassins does so first. Bruce's childhood friend, assistant district attorney Rachel Dawes, berates him for attempting to undermine the justice system, saying that his father would be ashamed. Bruce confronts Falcone, who tells him that real power comes from being feared. Bruce decides to travel the world and learn how to confront injustice. While serving a prison sentence for theft in Bhutan, he meets Henri Ducard, who trains him as a member of the League of Shadows, led by Ra's al Ghul. After completing his training and purging his fears, Bruce learns that the League intends to destroy Gotham, believing it to be corrupt, decadent, hypocritical and beyond saving. Bruce rejects the League's cause and burns down their temple during his escape. Ra's is killed by falling debris, while Bruce saves the unconscious", 'hi_en': "Chaudah saal baad, Chill ko free kar diya jata Gotham city mafia boss Carmine Falcone ke against testify karne ke liye. Bruce Chill ko marne ka intent rakhta hai, but Falcone ka assassine ye pahle kar deta hai. Bruce ka childhood ka friend, assistant district attorny Rachel Dawes, use kosti hai justice system ko undermine karne ke liye. wo kahti hai uske father ashamed honge. Bruce Falcone ko confront karta hua, wo use batata hai ki asli takat darne se aati hai. Bruce saari duniya travel karke injustice confront karna seekhne ka decide karta hai. Bhutan me chori ke aarop me saza kaatte hu wo Henri Ducard se milta hai, wo use Ra's al Ghul ke ledership wali league of shadows ke memeber ke roop me train karta hai. Apni training complete karne ke apne fear ko khatm karke Bruce ko pata chalta hai ki leaugue kaise Gotham ko destroy karna chahti hai, ise corrupt, decadent aur hypocritical aur repair ke bahar mankar. Bruce league ke karan ko reject kar deta hai aur unke temple ko escap ke dauran burn kar deta hai. Ra's girte hue malbe me dabkar mar jata hai, wahi bruce ko behoshi me paya jata hai,"}

{'en': 'Batman intercepts a drug shipment, provides Rachel with evidence against Falcone, and enlists Sergeant James Gordon, one of the few honest cops left in Gotham, to arrest him. In prison, Falcone meets with Dr. Jonathan Crane, a corrupt psychiatrist whom he has helped smuggle drugs into Gotham, and threatens to reveal his complicity if he does not declare  him mentally unfit for trial. Crane puts on a scarecrow mask and sprays Falcone with a fear- inducing hallucinogen that drives him insane (which causes Falcone to constantly mouth the  word "Scarecrow"), and has him transferred to Arkham Asylum. While investigating "the Scarecrow", Batman is exposed to the hallucinogen and left incapacitated. He is saved by Alfred and given an antidote developed by Fox. When Rachel accuses Crane of corruption, Crane reveals that he has been pouring his fear-inducing drug into Gotham\'s water supply. He drugs Rachel with it, but Batman saves her and subdues Crane, who claims to work for Ra\'s al Ghul. Batman evades the police to get Rachel to safety, administers the antidote, and gives her a vial of it for Gordon and another for mass production. Ducard reappears at Bruce\'s birthday party and reveals himself to be the true Ra\'s al Ghul. Having stolen a powerful microwave emitter from Wayne Enterprises, he plans to vaporize Gotham\'s water supply, rendering Crane\'s drug airborne and causing mass hysteria that will destroy the city. He sets Wayne Manor aflame and leaves Bruce to die, but Alfred rescues him.', 'hi_en': 'Batmain ek druag shipment ko accept karata hai, Rachel ko Falcone ke against saboot provide karaata hai, aur Sergeant James Gordon ko Gotham mein chhode gye kuchh imandaar police mein se ek ko arrest karane ke lie prerit karata hai. Jail mein, Falcone ek corrupt psychiatris Dr. Jonathan Crane ke saath milata hai, jise usane Gotham mein drugs ke taskai karane mein help ki hai, aur use maanasik roop se pareekshan ke liye. Crane ek scarecrow mask daalata hai aur ek bhay ke saath Falcone pe spray karta hai- use prerit karane vaale matibhram ko prerit karata hai (jisase Falcone shabd " Scarecrow " ko lagaataar munh mein le jaata hai), aur use Arkham Asylum mein transfer kara dita hai. " the Scarecrow " ki jaanch karate samay, batman ko hallucinogen ke sampark mein laaya jaata hai aur chhod diya jaata hai. Use Alfred dvaara bachaaya gaya hai aur Fox dvaara vikasit ek antidote diya gaya hai. Jab Rachel ne Crane par corruption ka aarop lagaaya, to Crane ne khulaasa kiya ki voh apane fear-inducing drug ko Gotham ke pani mein daal deta hai. Veh iske saath Rachel ko drugs deta hai, lekin Batman use bachaata hai aur Crane ko vash mein karta hai, jo Ra\'s al Ghul ke lie kaam karne ka daava karata hai. Batman police ko Rachel ko suraksha ke lie vikasit karata hai, antidote ka prashaasan karata hai, Aur use Gordo ke lie ek bottle deta hai aur doosare ko bade paimaane par utpaadan ke lie. Ducard Bruce ke janmadin ke party mein phir se prakat hota hai aur khud ko asalee Ra\'s al Ghul. hone ka khulaasa karta hai. Wayne Enterprises se ek shaktishali microwave emitter chori hone ke baad, usne Gotham ke pani ke supply ko vaashpit karane ki yojana banaee, Crane ke drug ko hava dene aur bade paimaane par hysteria paida karne ke kaaran jo shahar ko nasht kar dega. vah Wayne Manor ka naam taye karta hai aur Bruce ko marne ke lie chhod deta hai, lekin Alfred use bacha leta hai'}

The earliest scene has Turing in boarding school being bullied, and he makes a friend there that gets him interested in cryptography.', 'hi_en': '2014 kee philm se kambarabaich aur naitalee ke saath. shuruaatee drshy mein tyooring in bording skool ko badanaam kiya ja raha hai, aur vah vahaan ek dost banaata hai jo use kriptograaphee mein dilachaspee leta hai.'}
